message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more since the value decreases for me over time.
I'll take a bit more since the value doesn't decrease for me
Bob, the value is decreasing rapidly for me. Let's meet in the middle - my turn to get a bit more this time.
The value isn't changing for me, I can wait. You're losing value, maybe you should reconsider
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm losing a significant chunk of value with each round. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still waiting for a better deal. Time is on my side
